remarks: Properties that determine a complex vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isvci.1 $e |- G e. AbelOp $.
isvci.2 $e |- dom G = ( X X. X ) $.
isvci.3 $e |- S : ( CC X. X ) --> X $.
isvci.4 $e |- ( x e. X -> ( 1 S x ) = x ) $.
isvci.5 $e |- ( ( y e. CC /\ x e. X /\ z e. X ) -> ( y S ( x G z ) ) = ( ( y S x ) G ( y S z ) ) ) $.
isvci.6 $e |- ( ( y e. CC /\ z e. CC /\ x e. X ) -> ( ( y + z ) S x ) = ( ( y S x ) G ( z S x ) ) ) $.
isvci.7 $e |- ( ( y e. CC /\ z e. CC /\ x e. X ) -> ( ( y x. z ) S x ) = ( y S ( z S x ) ) ) $.
isvci.8 $e |- W = <. G , S >. $.
isvci $p |- W e. CVecOLD $.
$d G x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
